definitions.definition: A device used in the diagnosis and detection of heart abnormalities that measures electric potentials on the surface of the body and creates a record ( electrocardiogram ) of the electrical currents associated with heart muscle activity.

main_definition: A device used in the diagnosis and detection of heart abnormalities that measures electric potentials on the surface of the body and creates a record ( electrocardiogram ) of the electrical currents associated with heart muscle activity.
